notes: used mainly as a greeting; also written as 'buona notte'

example_sentence_english: Will you give me a good night?

example_sentence_italian: La buonanotte del papà è dolce.
example_sentence_english: The good night from Dad is sweet.
We exchange good nights every evening.

example_sentence_italian: Le buonanotti in famiglia sono un rito.
example_sentence_english: The good nights in the family are a ritual.

example_sentence_italian: Ci siamo detti delle buonanotti rapide.
example_sentence_english: We said some quick good nights to each other.
I remember the sweetness of the good night.

example_sentence_italian: Sono abituato alla buonanotte dei genitori.
example_sentence_english: I am used to the parents' good night.

example_sentence_italian: Dalla buonanotte capisco che è stanco.
example_sentence_english: From the good night I understand he is tired.

example_sentence_italian: C'è calma nella buonanotte del paese.
example_sentence_english: There is calm in the town's good night.

example_sentence_italian: Hanno scritto un messaggio sulla buonanotte.
example_sentence_english: They wrote a message on the good night.

example_sentence_italian: Con la buonanotte chiudo la giornata.
example_sentence_english: With the good night I end the day.

example_sentence_italian: Dalle foto ricordo i toni delle buonanotti.
example_sentence_english: From the photos I remember the tones of the good nights.

example_sentence_italian: Non sono abituato alle buonanotti rumorose.
example_sentence_english: I am not used to the noisy good nights.
From the good nights we understand the affection.

example_sentence_italian: Nelle buonanotti di agosto c'è silenzio.
example_sentence_english: In the August good nights there is silence.
We often discuss the hurried good nights.

example_sentence_italian: Con le buonanotti dei nonni i bimbi si calmano.
example_sentence_english: With the grandparents' good nights the children calm down.
